wiki.content:
"Friends Will Be Friends" was written by Freddie Mercury and John Deacon, with lyrics written by Mercury (which was confirmed by Brian May on his website) It's one of the last of Mercury's piano ballads, and it holds many musical similitudes with older Queen material, such as "Play the Game" and "We Are the Champions". It is another song not featured in Highlander. It was noted as being a modern update of the 70's Queen rock anthems "We Are The Champions" and "We Will Rock You" and reached #14 in the UK.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Friends Will Be Friends" was written by Freddie Mercury and John Deacon, with lyrics written by Mercury (which was confirmed by Brian May on his website) It's one of the last of Mercury's piano ballads, and it holds many musical similitudes with older Queen material, such as "Play the Game" and "We Are the Champions". It is another song not featured in Highlander. It was noted as being a modern update of the 70's Queen rock anthems "We Are The Champions" and "We Will Rock You" and reached #14 in the UK.

track.name: Friends Will Be Friends
comments: Amazing vocals <3 I love you Freddie <3
Right to the end. The end came way too soon Freddie. RIP You are missed :(

It's so easy now, cos you got friends you can trust, 
When you're in need of love they give you care and attention, 
When you're through with life and all hope is lost, 
Hold out your hand cos friends will be friends right till the end..
i love this song. so powerful, so meaningful. it brings me to tears. i dedicated this song to my best friend and he loved it :D
my first real concert ...gr8 way to lose my concert virginity eh?
This song helped me go through a painful breakup(: "As a matter of fact, you're getting used to life without him in your way." I've got friends I can trust<3
Great song, but it hurts me to hear this one because one friend of mine broke up with me for unknown reason and she introduced me to Queen's music. Friends will be friends... not :(
Hold out your hand cause friends will be friends right till the end. <33
That is truth. Friends will be Friends! ALLways.
I love Brian May's guitar work on this song.
